actions.text: Mr. Mollohan raised a point of order against the Fox amendment (A025). Mr. Mollohan stated that the provisions of the amendment made changes to existing law, constituting legislation on an Appropriations bill and was therefore, in violation of the rules of the House. The Chair sustained the point of order.

purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 57 in the Congressional Record to prohibit funds in the bill from being made available to the Palestinian Broadcasting Corporation.
